document.full_text: a cia contractor was acquitted of two murder charges and released by a pakistani court on wednesday after a deal to pay "blood money" to the victims' families, pakistani and u.s. officials said.
document.title: pakistan frees cia man after "blood money" paid
lines_and_colors: a cia contractor was acquitted of two murder charges and released by a pakistani court on wednesday after a deal to pay "blood money" to the victims' families, pakistani and u.s. officials said.
